badges.title: Volunteering Streak
badges.description: Recognized for maintaining a consistent volunteering streak for 3 months.
badges.pre_requisites: Attend and participate in at least one volunteering event every month for 3 consecutive months.

badges.title: Personal Supporter
badges.description: Recognized for providing personalized assistance in a one-on-one service event.
badges.pre_requisites: Participate in a private volunteering event, such as one-on-one counseling or support service.

badges.title: Dedicated Volunteer
badges.description: Acknowledged for your commitment to participating in over 20 volunteer activities.
badges.pre_requisites: Participate in more than 20 volunteering events.
